name: Stay Home
description:
You can run but you can't hide!

Blood and Brutality:

Smash zombies by shooting at their head and limbs, and don't forget you can only do this with powerful weapons!

Defensive Zones

4 different defense zones to repel hordes of zombies and hide. And remember, much more to come!

Get New Weapons

Earn zombie dollars by killing zombies and continue the slaughter by purchasing new weapons with these coins.

Multiplayer Co Op Mod



The swarm of zombies you escaped with your friends followed you by smelling your scent and found you. Defend this house as best you can to survive because you have nowhere else to run! Create carnage by killing hordes of deadly zombies!

Singleplayer Mod



As a lone wolf you went out in search of food but you encountered hordes of zombies and you tried to escape from them but they followed your scent and found you in your hiding place. Try to survive as long as you can by killing the hordes of zombies that flock to you!
